general: Implement the 'Sonic Liquid' theme using the specified color palette and glassmorphism utilities.
Use 'Syne' font for all headings and 'Manrope' for body text.
Ensure all text is strictly Black, White, or Transparent (using opacity). No colored text.
Do NOT use background images for sections. Use CSS gradients, mesh gradients, or the 'noise' SVG pattern provided.
Images should ONLY appear within floating glass widgets or cards.
Use 'framer-motion' for entrance animations (fade-up, stagger) and hover effects.
Ensure the Admin Dashboard is protected and functional.

pages.home: Hero section must feature a parallax glass effect. Services preview should use the 'Tracing Beam' style.
pages.services: Display services as a grid of glass cards. Each card should have a subtle glow on hover.
pages.projects: Use a 'Tetris' or 'Bento' grid layout for the portfolio. Images should be high-quality and cover the card background with a gradient overlay.
pages.booking: Create a multi-step booking form inside a glass modal. No login required.
pages.admin: Dashboard must be dense but readable. Use 'Control Room' grid layout.

motion: Implement smooth scrolling using 'lenis' if possible, or standard CSS scroll-behavior.
Add parallax effects to floating elements in the Hero section.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
